hero.desc: A personalized song is a unique gift for a wedding, birthday or anniversary. We will turn your story into a real hit.

review.desc: Join 100+ happy customers who turned their memories into music.

aboutPrice.description: Flowers die in a week. Dinner lasts an hour. But a song creates a memory that lives on repeat. Usually, a custom studio track costs $300+, but we've optimized the process to make professional music accessible to everyone.

steps.subtitle: How It Works
steps.step1_desc: Fill out a quick form. Share names, memories, inside jokes, and the mood you want. It takes 5 minutes.
steps.step2_desc: Complete your order with a flat fee of $59. No hidden costs. We accept Apple Pay, PayPal, and cards.
steps.step3_desc: In 3-5 days, receive your custom studio-quality song in your email. Get tissues ready for the reaction!

FAQ.subtitle: Common Questions
FAQ.q1_question: Can I choose the genre and mood?
FAQ.q1_answer: Absolutely! Whether you want a tear-jerking acoustic ballad, an upbeat pop hit, or a classic country song, you call the shots. You'll select your preferred style in the order form.
FAQ.q2_question: How long does it take to get my song?
FAQ.q2_answer: Our standard delivery time is 3-5 days.
FAQ.q3_answer: You will receive a high-quality studio MP3 file of your custom song, ready to be played on any device.
FAQ.q4_question: Is it really only $59? Are there hidden fees?
FAQ.q4_answer: Yes, it is a one-time flat fee of $59. You get full ownership of the song for personal use. No subscriptions, no royalties, no hidden costs.
FAQ.q5_question: What if I don't like the song?
FAQ.q5_answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. If there is a mistake in the lyrics or names, we will fix it for free. We strive to make every song a hit that you'll cherish forever.

Footer.brand_desc: We turn your favorite memories into custom studio-quality songs. The perfect gift for weddings, anniversaries, and birthdays.
Footer.payment_desc: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.
